faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions

q1.question: Is it really free?
q1.answer: Yes, we have a free package that gives you full access to basic features. You can upgrade anytime for additional features.

q2.question: How many platforms can I connect?
q2.answer: You can connect unlimited platforms. We support 50+ popular platforms.

q3.question: Is my data secure?
q3.answer: Absolutely. We use international-standard security with SSL Certificate and encrypt all data.

q4.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q4.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime. No penalties or additional fees.
